ing: 2 fluid ounces sweetened coffee creamer (such as International DelightÂ®)
des: "This grown-up version of a root beer float is fun enough to drink in a fancy frosted glass with a curly straw. I prefer International DelightÂ® Cold Stone Creamery Sweet Cream or Dunkin DonutsÂ® Extra Extra Sweet flavor. I used a store brand root beer and the least expensive coconut rum my store had at the time."
ins: Pour ice into a glass. Top ice with rum and creamer; stir to combine. Pour root beer over the top.
